languages.text: Вопли отчаяния заглушают шум нижних палуб, когда металлическая дубина дробит кости и череп своей жертвы. Брызги темной крови отпечатываются на стенах, полу, трубах и вентилях, которые вас недавно заставляли драить. Закончив работу, офицер салютует и просит следовать за ним — домой, на верхние палубы. Обернувшись напоследок, вы замечаете оборванцев с щетками и тряпками, усердно счищающих кровавое месиво, оставшееся от блюстительницы, и молящихся о милости Богу-Императору.

traits.locale_text: Вопли отчаяния заглушают шум нижних палуб, когда металлическая дубина дробит кости и череп своей жертвы. Брызги темной крови отпечатываются на стенах, полу, трубах и вентилях, которые вас недавно заставляли драить. Закончив работу, офицер салютует и просит следовать за ним — домой, на верхние палубы. Обернувшись напоследок, вы замечаете оборванцев с щетками и тряпками, усердно счищающих кровавое месиво, оставшееся от блюстительницы, и молящихся о милости Богу-Императору.

languages.text: Wails of despair drown out the din of the lower decks as a metal club crushes its victim's skull and bones. Dark splatters of blood mark the bulkheads, deck, pipes, and ducts, the very ones you were made to scrub not so long ago. His work done, the officer salutes you and bids you follow him to the upper decks. Home. You turn around to take one last look and notice the tattered denizens, armed with brooms and rags, industriously cleaning up the enforcer's gory remains, and praying to the God-Emperor for mercy.

Брызги темной крови отпечатываются на стенах, полу, трубах и вентилях, которые вас недавно заставляли драить. Закончив работу, офицер салютует и просит следовать за ним — домой, на верхние палубы. Обернувшись напоследок, вы замечаете оборванцев с щетками и тряпками, усердно счищающих кровавое месиво, оставшееся от блюстительницы, и молящихся о милости Богу-Императору.

traits.locale_text: Wails of despair drown out the din of the lower decks as a metal club crushes its victim's skull and bones. Dark splatters of blood mark the walls, floor, pipes, and ducts which you were made to scrub not so long ago. His work done, the officer salutes you and bids you follow him to the upper decks. Home. You turn around to take one last look and notice people dressed in rags and using more rags, along with brooms, to carefully clean up the gory remains of the guard. They pray to the God-Emperor for mercy.

They pray to the God-Emperor for mercy.

Wails of despair drown out the din of the lower decks as a metal club crushes its victim's skull and bones. Dark splatters of blood mark the bulkheads, deck, pipes, and ducts, the very ones the Rogue Trader was made to scrub not so long ago. His work done, the officer salutes the Rogue Trader and bids {mf|him|her} follow him to the upper decks. Home. The Rogue Trader turns around to take one last look and notices the tattered denizens, armed with brooms and rags, industriously cleaning up the enforcer's gory remains, and praying to the God-Emperor for mercy.

languages.text: 绝望的哀嚎声盖过了下层甲板的喧嚣。金属棍击碎了受害者的头颅与骨头，阴暗的血迹溅在了舱壁、甲板、管道与通道上，而这些地方正是不久前你清洗过的地方。军官完成了他的任务，向你敬了个礼，并让你跟随他前往上层甲板，是时候回家了。你转过身看了最后一眼。那些衣衫褴褛的人们，此刻正拿着扫帚与抹布，勤勤恳恳地清理着执法者鲜血淋漓的尸体，祈求着神皇的怜悯。
languages.original_text: Wails of despair drown out the din of the lower decks as a metal club crushes its victim's skull and bones. Dark splatters of blood mark the bulkheads, deck, pipes, and ducts, the very ones you were made to scrub not so long ago. His work done, the officer salutes you and bids you follow him to the upper decks. Home. You turn around to take one last look and notice the tattered denizens, armed with brooms and rags, industriously cleaning up the enforcer's gory remains, and praying to the God-Emperor for mercy.

traits.locale_text: 绝望的哀嚎声盖过了下层甲板的喧嚣。金属棍击碎了受害者的头颅与骨头，阴暗的血迹溅在了舱壁、甲板、管道与通道上，而这些地方正是不久前你清洗过的地方。军官完成了他的任务，向你敬了个礼，并让你跟随他前往上层甲板，是时候回家了。你转过身看了最后一眼。那些衣衫褴褛的人们，此刻正拿着扫帚与抹布，勤勤恳恳地清理着执法者鲜血淋漓的尸体，祈求着神皇的怜悯。

languages.text: Los aullidos de desesperación sofocan el escándalo de las cubiertas inferiores cuando un garrote de metal rompe el cráneo y el cuerpo de su víctima. Manchas oscuras de sangre salpican las mamparas, la cubierta, las tuberías y los conductos que hace poco habías tenido que limpiar. Con su misión cumplida, el oficial se cuadra frente a ti y te pide que le sigas a las cubiertas superiores. A casa. {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán echa un último vistazo a su espalda para ver que los residentes harapientos, armados con escobas y trapos, limpian con diligencia los restos cruentos de la guardia mientras piden misericordia al Dios Emperador.
languages.original_text: Wails of despair drown out the din of the lower decks as a metal club crushes its victim's skull and bones. Dark splatters of blood mark the bulkheads, deck, pipes, and ducts, the very ones you were made to scrub not so long ago. His work done, the officer salutes you and bids you follow him to the upper decks. Home. You turn around to take one last look and notice the tattered denizens, armed with brooms and rags, industriously cleaning up the enforcer's gory remains, and praying to the God-Emperor for mercy.

traits.locale_text: Los aullidos de desesperación sofocan el escándalo de las cubiertas inferiores mientras una porra de metal rompe el cráneo y el cuerpo de su víctima. Manchas oscuras de sangre salpican las mamparas, la cubierta, las tuberías y los conductos que hace poco estuvo limpiando {mf|el|la} propi{mf|o|a} Comerciante Independiente. Con su misión cumplida, el oficial se cuadra frente a{mf|l| la} Comerciante y le pide que le siga a las cubiertas superiores. A casa. {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán echa un último vistazo a su espalda para ver que los residentes harapientos, armados con escobas y trapos, limpian con diligencia los restos cruentos de la guardia mientras piden misericordia al Dios Emperador.

languages.text: 金属の棍棒が頭蓋骨と骨を砕く。犠牲者の絶望の叫びが下甲板の騒音をかき消す。隔壁、甲板、パイプ、ダクトには血がこびりつく。ついこの間、あなたが磨くように言い渡されたまさにその場所だ。仕事を終えた士官はあなたに敬礼し、上甲板まで来てもらうように言う。家だ。あなたが最後にもう一度見ようと振り向くと、箒や雑巾で武装したボロボロの住人たちが、執行官の痛ましい遺体をせっせと掃除し、神帝陛下に慈悲を乞うているのに気がついた。
languages.original_text: Wails of despair drown out the din of the lower decks as a metal club crushes its victim's skull and bones. Dark splatters of blood mark the bulkheads, deck, pipes, and ducts, the very ones you were made to scrub not so long ago. His work done, the officer salutes you and bids you follow him to the upper decks. Home. You turn around to take one last look and notice the tattered denizens, armed with brooms and rags, industriously cleaning up the enforcer's gory remains, and praying to the God-Emperor for mercy.

traits.locale_text: 金属の棍棒が頭蓋骨と骨を砕く。犠牲者の絶望の叫びが下甲板の騒音をかき消す。隔壁、甲板、パイプ、ダクトには血がこびりつく。ついこの間、ローグトレーダーが磨くように言い渡されたまさにその場所だ。仕事を終えた士官はローグトレーダーに敬礼し、上甲板まで来てもらうように言う。家だ。ローグトレーダーが最後にもう一度見ようと振り向くと、箒や雑巾で武装したボロボロの住人たちが、執行官の痛ましい遺体をせっせと掃除し、神帝陛下に慈悲を乞うているのに気がついた。

languages.text: Verzweifelte Schreie übertönen den Lärm der Unterdecks, als eine Metallkeule Schädel und Knochen ihres Opfers zertrümmert. Dunkle Blutspritzer verteilen sich an den Wänden, Rohren und Schächten, die du vor Kurzem noch schrubben musstest. Nachdem sein Werk vollbracht ist, salutiert der Offizier und bittet dich, ihm auf die oberen Decks zu folgen. Nach Hause. Du sieht dich ein letztes Mal um und bemerkst, wie die elenden Bewohner der Decks mit Besen und Lumpen eifrig die blutigen Überreste der Enforcerin beseitigen und dabei den Gottimperator um Gnade anflehen.
languages.original_text: Wails of despair drown out the din of the lower decks as a metal club crushes its victim's skull and bones. Dark splatters of blood mark the bulkheads, deck, pipes, and ducts, the very ones you were made to scrub not so long ago. His work done, the officer salutes you and bids you follow him to the upper decks. Home. You turn around to take one last look and notice the tattered denizens, armed with brooms and rags, industriously cleaning up the enforcer's gory remains, and praying to the God-Emperor for mercy.

traits.locale_text: Verzweifelte Schreie übertönen den Lärm der Unterdecks, als eine Metallkeule Schädel und Knochen ihres Opfers zertrümmert. Dunkle Blutspritzer verteilen sich an den Wänden, Rohren und Schächten, die du vor Kurzem noch schrubben musstest. Nachdem sein Werk vollbracht ist, salutiert der Offizier und bittet dich, ihm auf die oberen Decks zu folgen. Nach Hause. Du sieht dich ein letztes Mal um und bemerkst, wie die elenden Bewohner der Decks mit Besen und Lumpen eifrig die blutigen Überreste der Enforcerin beseitigen und dabei den Gottimperator um Gnade anflehen.

Verzweifelte Schreie übertönen den Lärm der Unterdecks, als eine Metallkeule den Schädel und die Knochen ihres Opfers zertrümmert. Dunkle Blutspritzer verteilen sich auf den Wänden, den Rohren und Schächten, dem Boden, den {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} vor kurzem noch schrubben musste. Nachdem sein Werk vollbracht ist, salutiert der Offizier vor {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} und bittet {mf|ihn|sie} ihm auf die oberen Decks zu folgen. Nach Hause. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} sieht sich noch ein letztes Mal um und bemerkt, wie die elenden Bewohner der Decks mit Besen und Lumpen eifrig die blutigen Überreste der Enforcerin beseitigen und dabei den Gottimperator um Gnade anflehen.

languages.text: Des cris de désespoir recouvrent le vacarme des ponts inférieurs tandis qu'une matraque de métal brise le crâne et les os de sa victime. De sombres traînées de sang maculent le pont et les cloisons, tuyaux et conduits que vous aviez dû récurer peu de temps auparavant. Sa mission accomplie, l'officier vous salue et vous invite à le suivre jusqu'aux ponts supérieurs. À la maison. Vous vous retournez pour jeter un dernier regard sur les citoyens en guenilles armés de balais et de chiffons, affairés à nettoyer les restes sanglants de l'exécutante tout en implorant la miséricorde de l'Empereur-Dieu.
languages.original_text: Wails of despair drown out the din of the lower decks as a metal club crushes its victim's skull and bones. Dark splatters of blood mark the bulkheads, deck, pipes, and ducts, the very ones you were made to scrub not so long ago. His work done, the officer salutes you and bids you follow him to the upper decks. Home. You turn around to take one last look and notice the tattered denizens, armed with brooms and rags, industriously cleaning up the enforcer's gory remains, and praying to the God-Emperor for mercy.

traits.locale_text: Des cris de désespoir recouvrent le vacarme des ponts inférieurs tandis qu'une matraque de métal brise le crâne et les os de sa victime. De sombres traînées de sang maculent le pont et les cloisons, tuyaux et conduits que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} avait dû récurer peu de temps auparavant. Sa mission accomplie, l'officier salue {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} et l'invite à le suivre jusqu'aux ponts supérieurs. À la maison. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} se retourne pour pour jeter un dernier regard sur les citoyens en guenilles armés de balais et de chiffons, affairés à nettoyer les restes sanglants de l'exécutante tout en implorant la miséricorde de l'Empereur-Dieu.

languages.text: Alt güvertelerden yükselen umutsuzluk çığlıkları, metal bir copun kurbanının kafatasını ve kemiklerini ezmesinin yankılarını bastırıyor. Karanlık kan sıçramaları, daha önce temizlemen istenen duvarları, güverteyi, boruları ve kanalları kaplıyor. İşini bitiren subay seni selamlıyor ve üst güvertelere, evine gidiş yolunda sana eşlik ediyor. Arkana dönüp son bir kez baktığında, yırtık pırtık kıyafetli sakinlerin ellerinde süpürge ve bezlerle infazcının kanlı kalıntılarını temizleyip İnsanlığın İmparatoru'ndan merhamet dilediklerini görüyorsun.
languages.original_text: Wails of despair drown out the din of the lower decks as a metal club crushes its victim's skull and bones. Dark splatters of blood mark the bulkheads, deck, pipes, and ducts, the very ones you were made to scrub not so long ago. His work done, the officer salutes you and bids you follow him to the upper decks. Home. You turn around to take one last look and notice the tattered denizens, armed with brooms and rags, industriously cleaning up the enforcer's gory remains, and praying to the God-Emperor for mercy.
